scripts.test: npm run sftp:start && (npm run test:run; npm run sftp:stop)
scripts.test:coverage: npm run sftp:start && (npm run test:run:coverage; npm run sftp:stop)
scripts.test:run: wait-on tcp:localhost:2222 && mkdir -p test/report && npm run cucumber:exec && npm run test:finalize
scripts.test:run:coverage: wait-on tcp:localhost:2222 && mkdir -p test/report && npm run cucumber:exec:coverage && npm run test:finalize
scripts.cucumber:exec: HOSTNAME=localhost USERNAME=testuser SFTP_PORT=2222 SFTP_PASS=testpass npx cucumber-js -f json:test/report/sftp.json --require "stepDefinitions/*.js" features/$FEATURE_FILE
scripts.cucumber:exec:coverage: HOSTNAME=localhost USERNAME=testuser SFTP_PORT=2222 SFTP_PASS=testpass npx nyc --reporter=lcov --reporter=text --report-dir=../../coverage npx cucumber-js -f json:test/report/sftp.json --require "stepDefinitions/*.js" features/$FEATURE_FILE
